name: geopandas

chunks.text:
GeoPandas is a project to add support for geographic data to
`pandas`_ objects.

The goal of GeoPandas is to make working with geospatial data in
python easier. It combines the capabilities of `pandas`_ and `shapely`_,
providing geospatial operations in pandas and a high-level interface
to multiple geometries to shapely. GeoPandas enables you to easily do
operations in python that would otherwise require a spatial database
such as PostGIS.

.. _pandas: https://pandas.pydata.org
.. _shapely: https://shapely.readthedocs.io/en/latest/

usage_description:
Here is a 2-sentence summary of what a developer can achieve with the geopandas library:

This library is used to easily work with geographic data in Python, combining the capabilities of pandas and shapely to provide high-level geospatial operations. With GeoPandas, developers can perform complex spatial analysis and operations that would otherwise require a spatial database like PostGIS directly within their Python code.
